page.title: 01S.E.Ashford and Great Chart
page.content: This area is changing rapidly.It was mostly farm land but the town of Ashford is growing.It used to be a small market town but now they are building industrial and housing estates.These are spreading out and taking up the farm land.Two of our schools are on new housing developments,St.Simons and Godinton Primary, and two in the village of Great Chart,Great Chart Primary and The Friars.Some people were born here but more are moving in.The Army Barracks accounts for some of this. We have looked at the countryside,the farms and the people around us and have noticed the changes happening now.It is still mostly a rural area,with nice countryside,village life in Great Chart,the old country house at Godinton Park,the farms,but this is under threat.
